verbose_text: LIF activates JAK / Stat3 as well as PI3K / AKT and MEK / ERK signaling pathways, while GCSF activates JAK / Stat3 but not PI3K / AKT and MEK / ERK pathways in B6-S3Y118F mESCs due to the lack of the Src homology phosphatase 2 (SHP2) docking site in the chimeric gp130-Y118F chimeric receptor.
evidence: LIF activates JAK/Stat3 as well as PI3K
